title: Knowledge
heading: SW Development is Formalizing Knowledge
content:
The main goal of SW Development is not typing code but to make explicit a behavior that is sometimes intuitive or ad-hoc.

The real purpose of any implementation is to properly define the right responses across a flow of actions.

Thousands of years ago, egyptians were measuring the Nile rises. They believed that they were measuring the earth, whilst they were actually setting the basis for geo-metry. In some years, when talking about our times, people may well say “those ancient guys believed they were programming, but they were actually making knowledge explicit and formal”.
